show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Prescriptions for Health, 2/27/12. BPA or Bisphenol A found to increase the risk of heart disease plus other... <!--more--> harms.
Stainless steel and copper for killing germs.
SS and glass as alternatives to plastic.
Why is Vitamin D in the news again?
Working out for depression and burnout….
even on the job.
In the absence of symptoms, carotid ultrasounds are of no benefit.
Testing for osteoporosis and EKG’s, etc.
over done (Churches need to research).
Virtual Colonoscopy offers little benefit.
What are the best probiotics that will survive the digestive tract?
Medical Ethics Vicki’s 20:20 Health Tips: Trust your husband?
LOL for laughter is the best medicine Oldie’s at lunch….
another LOL, “         “   “     “        “ Caller: Stuart from LA, CA - BPA concern and bladder stone.
